response.overview: Entire Story takes place over a single night. It revolves around Jansi and her 8yr old child, who gets trapped between third world war tensions and dangereous men Lal Chetta, Khan Bhai & Ranga Reddy. These men far more dangerous than wild animals. The Note film thrillingly portraits by how Jansi uses her intelligence to escape and bring everything to an end.
response.title: Anali
